name: My Balloon Friend LD46
description:
My Balloon Friend is a game about keeping your balloon from hitting the ground and popping.

controls: arrows move, space jumps, P pauses, Esc exits, R resets the current level

Things I didnt have time to do but wanted to: redo the 30 second graphics I made on day 1 make some music(there is none atm) better balloon physics better running/jumping

All and all Im pretty happy with how this turned out considering its my first finished game in years ^^
